meanings.definition: A soft leather made from the skin of the chamois antelope.
meanings.sent1: I bought a pair of gloves made of chamois to keep my hands warm.
meanings.sent2: The hunter proudly displayed his chamois trophy on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The fashion designer created a stunning jacket using chamois leather.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was as smooth as chamois, soothing everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The chamois leather felt like a cloud against my skin.

meanings.definition: A type of soft cloth used for cleaning or polishing.
meanings.sent1: I always use a chamois to wipe my car for a streak-free shine.
meanings.sent2: The maid used a chamois to clean the windows and make them sparkle.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a never-ending chamois from his hat, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a chamois, effortlessly brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The chamois cloth absorbed the spill quickly, saving the carpet from stains.
